# Moja propozycja  

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, verbose=FALSE}
source("kodzik.R")
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)


GraphConfirmed <- ggplot(Poland, aes(x = date, y = daily_confirmed)) +
  geom_line(color = "Orange", size = 1) +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Liczba nowych\npotwierdzonych\nprzypadków\nzakażenia") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(angle = 0, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0.5))
GraphDeaths <- ggplot(Poland, aes(x = date, y = daily_deaths)) +
  geom_line(color = "Orange", size = 1) +
  theme_minimal() +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Liczba nowych\npotwierdzonych\nprzypadków\nśmiertelnych") +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(angle = 0, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0.5))
# grid.arrange(GraphConfirmed, GraphDeaths, nrow = 1)
GraphConfirmed
GraphDeaths
```
